text: <@U7SL518D6> <@U6W3H6YN8> do you plan to add an easy way to add external packages/modules without using webpack ? just 4 modules is quite a little and using serverless functions (that are awesome) often requires other
Yep, we are planning on making it easier to include dependencies :thumbsup:
In an ideal world, how would you like it to work? cc <@UEKMY50SU> <@U6GNQ7JBU>
An an ideal world when I make a require on dependancies that are not included like require(‘cheerio’) or require(‘markdown’) an automate installs it for me :slightly_smiling_face:

Or could be specified in serverless.json

Personally I'm a big fan of Firebase's workflow just utilizing a package.json, but I think that would require functions to be declared in folders rather than individual files
Our current plan is around a  `package.json` file that can be reused across functions
